alert.note: Alert for Jemez Mountains; Northwest Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albuquerque (Northern and Central New Mexico)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued November 30 at 10:56AM MST until December 02 at 6:00AM MST by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MST SATURDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 3 to 6 inches except 6 to 12 inches above 9000 feet. * WHERE...Jemez Mountains, Northwest Highlands, West Central Mountains, and West Central Plateau. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MST Saturday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult. Tire chains may be necessary if traveling through mountain passes. The hazardous conditions could impact the Thursday evening commutes. This includes portions of I-40 and U.S. 550.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions, dial 511 or 1.800.432.4269, or visit http://nmroads.com.

area.areaDesc: Jemez Mountains; Northwest Highlands; West Central Mountains; West Central Plateau
